short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada requires the supply, delivery, offloading and installation of one (1) soft mount washer extractor to Drumheller Institution
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME and Correctional Services Canada (CSC) has a requirement for the supply, delivery, offloading and installation of one (1) soft mount washer extractor to Drumheller Institution in Drumheller, Alberta.
full_summary:
=====================================

### 21530-23S001B - Soft Mount Washer Extractor Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Number:** WS3960810371
**Publication Date:** July 31, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 16, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
**Amendment Number:** 2

**Sourcing Information:**
-------------------------

The Canada Buys (Achats Canada) portal has published a tender announcement for the supply, delivery, offloading, and installation of one (1) soft mount washer extractor to Drumheller Institution in Drumheller, Alberta.

**Background Information:**
---------------------------

The Correctional Services Canada (CSC) requires the services of a qualified contractor to provide a soft mount washer extractor for use in their facility. This procurement cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number WS3960901834 dated May 2, 2023. The request for proposals (RFP) was originally scheduled to close on June 8, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.

**Key Terms:**
--------------

*   **Type of Contract:** Supply and installation of equipment
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding
*   **Selection Criterion:** Lowest price
*   ** Tender Status:** Expiring on August 16, 2023

**Submission Requirements:**
---------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by August 16, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Debriefing or Feedback Session:**
--------------------------------

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to offerors who submitted a proposal in response to the previous solicitation.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender announcement, please contact Erin Kaiser via erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

Note: All contact information that was shared with me by the contractor has been redacted.

I formatted all the data above in the Markdown standard format that is typically used in technical writing. It seems easier to follow with this formatting.
